PackageOracle.name: DA_CHANNEL_RELATED
PackageOracle.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CHTR.DA_CHANNEL_RELATED
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.39.45.068227000 PM -06:00 */
AS

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,channel_id IN NUMBER
,related_channel_id IN NUMBER
,channel_related_role_cd IN VARCHAR2
,channel_related_start_dt IN DATE
,channel_related_end_dt IN DATE
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,channel_id IN NUMBER
,related_channel_id IN NUMBER
,channel_related_role_cd IN VARCHAR2
,channel_related_start_dt IN DATE
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

END da_channel_related;

body.name: DA_CHANNEL_RELATED
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.DA_CHANNEL_RELATED
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.39.45.081609000 PM -06:00 */
AS

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,channel_id IN NUMBER
,related_channel_id IN NUMBER
,channel_related_role_cd IN VARCHAR2
,channel_related_start_dt IN DATE
,channel_related_end_dt IN DATE
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_channel_related.add, parms=' || channel_id || '|' || related_channel_id || '|' || channel_related_role_cd || '|' || channel_related_start_dt || '|' || channel_related_end_dt || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_channel_related a
(
a.channel_id
,a.related_channel_id
,a.channel_related_role_cd
,a.channel_related_start_dt
,a.channel_related_end_dt
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
add.channel_id
,add.related_channel_id
,add.channel_related_role_cd
,add.channel_related_start_dt
,add.channel_related_end_dt
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_channel_related.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,channel_id IN NUMBER
,related_channel_id IN NUMBER
,channel_related_role_cd IN VARCHAR2
,channel_related_start_dt IN DATE
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_channel_related.del, parms=' || channel_id || '|' || related_channel_id || '|' || channel_related_role_cd || '|' || channel_related_start_dt || '|' || audit_user || '|');
UPDATE chtr.t_channel_related a
SET a.record_stat = 'D'
,a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
,a.modified_by = del.audit_user
WHERE a.channel_id = del.channel_id
AND a.related_channel_id = del.related_channel_id
AND a.channel_related_role_cd = del.channel_related_role_cd
AND a.channel_related_start_dt = del.channel_related_start_dt
;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_channel_related.del');

END del;

END da_channel_related;
